user_query: I'm feeling down and could use a good laugh. Can you entertain me with a random dad joke and show me some hilarious GIFs? Also, I'd love to hear a funny Chuck Norris joke to brighten my day. Thanks!

TaskList.description: Fetch a random dad joke to entertain the user.
Retrieve a selection of hilarious GIFs to uplift the user's mood.
Get a funny Chuck Norris joke to make the user laugh.
